name: ArtiCoin
description: Atc is a solana blockchain token that supports community building and social interaction with cryptocurrency rewards on Solana blockchain. Atc combines concepts from social media with lessons learned from building cryptocurrencies and their communities. An important key to inspiring participation in any community, currency or free market economy is a fair accounting system that consistently reflects each personâ€™s contribution. Articoin is attempting an accurate and transparency reward platform, which will unbound number of individuals who make subjective contributions to its community.
